# The `LivePhysRegs` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A set of physical registers with utility functions to track liveness when walking backward/forward through a basic block. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::LivePhysRegs</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

A set of physical registers with utility functions to track liveness when walking backward/forward through a basic block.

Definition at line 52 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/livephysregs-h">LivePhysRegs.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### addLiveIns() {#a972dc07ee343dfa21fc84131ada0e688}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LivePhysRegs::addLiveIns (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB)</>}>
Adds all live-in registers of basic block <code>MBB</code>.

Live in registers are the registers in the blocks live-in list and the pristine registers.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/livephysregs-h/#l00137">137</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/livephysregs-h">LivePhysRegs.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livephysregs-cpp/#l00238">238</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livephysregs-cpp">LivePhysRegs.cpp</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/livephysregs-h/#l00141">141</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/livephysregs-h">LivePhysRegs.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livephysregs-cpp/#l00244">244</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livephysregs-cpp">LivePhysRegs.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### addLiveOuts() {#abb67d4b6f48395a5aca25fc32e042928}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LivePhysRegs::addLiveOuts (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB)</>}>
Adds all live-out registers of basic block <code>MBB</code>.

Live out registers are the union of the live-in registers of the successor blocks and pristine registers. Live out registers of the end block are the callee saved registers. If a register is not added by this method, it is guaranteed to not be live out from MBB, although a sub-register may be. This is true both before and after regalloc.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/livephysregs-h/#l00150">150</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/livephysregs-h">LivePhysRegs.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livephysregs-cpp/#l00232">232</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livephysregs-cpp">LivePhysRegs.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### contains() {#a05ce2aec67d9c398ce268ac0c33c5c7b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::LivePhysRegs::contains (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a> Reg) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Returns true if register <code>Reg</code> is contained in the set.

This also works if only the super register of <code>Reg</code> has been defined, because <a href="#adbf2afbb346e40106f344191309324fc">addReg()</a> always adds all sub-registers to the set as well. Note: Returns false if just some sub registers are live, use <a href="#a5c249924553aa84c5927b2335c490583">available()</a> when searching a free register.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/livephysregs-h/#l00109">109</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/livephysregs-h">LivePhysRegs.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Removes physical registers clobbered by the regmask operand <code>MO</code>.

### stepBackward() {#a683d33b7b0ca1cf29e61a3dc4614a046}

Simulates liveness when stepping backwards over an instruction(bundle).

Simulates liveness when stepping backwards over an instruction(bundle): Remove Defs, add uses.

Remove Defs, add uses. This is the recommended way of calculating liveness.

This is the recommended way of calculating liveness.

### stepForward() {#a3f06df57fdd66d54f952c1c60e5048c3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LivePhysRegs::stepForward (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; std::pair&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aad72cfbb210808985a9dc19f4e5d8542">MCPhysReg</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &#42; &gt; &gt; &amp; Clobbers)</>}>
Simulates liveness when stepping forward over an instruction(bundle).

Simulates liveness when stepping forward over an instruction(bundle): Remove killed-uses, add defs.

Remove killed-uses, add defs. This is the not recommended way, because it depends on accurate kill flags. If possible use <a href="#a683d33b7b0ca1cf29e61a3dc4614a046">stepBackward()</a> instead of this function. The clobbers set will be the list of registers either defined or clobbered by a regmask. The operand will identify whether this is a regmask or register operand.

This is the not recommended way, because it depends on accurate kill flags. If possible use <a href="#a683d33b7b0ca1cf29e61a3dc4614a046">stepBackward()</a> instead of this function.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/livephysregs-h/#l00131">131</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/livephysregs-h">LivePhysRegs.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livephysregs-cpp/#l00080">80</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/livephysregs-cpp">LivePhysRegs.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
